entry.title: My Dogtor Thinks I'm Dying
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,879Chapters: 6/9Kudos: 161

Summary: Stiles doesn’t think there’s anything wrong with him, except maybe chronic over-caffeination. But his dad’s retired K-9, Bandit, disagrees. According to TikTok, that means cancer. Or seizures. Or secret pregnancy. Cue Stiles in an exam room, shirt off, face burning, while Derek Hale—yes, that Derek Hale, his long-forgotten high school crush turned absurdly hot doctor—takes his medical history like it’s no big deal. It’s fine. Totally fine. Not a meet-cute. Definitely not.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 88,384Chapters: 55/75Kudos: 52

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: does not heal
entry.summary:
Author: splinnters

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,822Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: “Stiles,” Scott says, but Stiles shushes him, and presses play. Immediately, voices blare out of the tinny little speakers. The image is blurry at first, like the camera was being waved around, and then it clears up. Filling most of the frame is a table with about a hundred kids around it, all crowding a scrawny boy with jet black hair and a ten thousand watt smile. Derek, Stiles thinks, although he’s barely recognizable. How could that be Derek Hale? Or, Stiles finds a box of home videos in the burnt down Hale house. Things get complicated.

entry.title: Town Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Red_127

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,964Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 131

Summary: After Stiles's mother dies, his father remarries Melissa McCall and Stiles suddenly finds himself on the outskirts of his own family. In his last year of high school and while taking night classes as a local community college, Stiles meets Derek Hale and the two make an instant connection. Derek pulls Stiles into his own family and shows him what it's like to truly be loved by people who would do anything for you. Even when that means causing abnormal amounts of chaos, tricking the entire town, and generally ruining the Sheriff's Day.

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,655Chapters: 15/18Kudos: 16

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: Messages
entry.summary:
Author: isthatbloodonhisshirt (wasterella)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 117,714Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 205

Summary: “When McCall called to say you’d lost your mind, I thought he was fucking with me. It implies you had a mind to lose to begin with.”“Do you know what this heathen did?!” Stiles demanded, facing Jackson around the side of the board, but pointing his marker backwards towards the apartment across the way.“I probably don’t care,” Jackson admitted, sighing in annoyance.“He was watching Star Wars out of order, Jackson! Out. Of. Order! Not like, the original trilogy, then the prequels, then the sequels, oh no! No! He was watching them all willy nilly in whatever order he wanted!”“The tragedy,” Jackson deadpanned, coming around the entertainment unit so he was beside Stiles at the whiteboard.

entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,126Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 199

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,528Chapters: 7/15Kudos: 101

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,337Chapters: 17/20Kudos: 267

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: Enter: Zombies
entry.summary:
Author: hyacinth_fiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,101Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 68

Summary: The universe has a wonderful sense of timing and Stiles and co. are thrown into all kinds of antics when the world goes to hell in a handbasket. Join them as they journey away from the security of their old lives and towards the hope of a new safety. Do they make it? I suppose you'll have to read on to find out.This story is going to be slow burn, like that languid yearning we all know and love seasoned with well-ripened apocalypse angst. There will be spice in this tale, though not for a while.Solid trigger warning for canon-typical blood/violence, sex (specifically the queer kind), casual swearing, and some other bits I'll stick in the notes of the relevant chapters

entry.title: Inciting Spark
entry.summary:
Author: LLN3dseestheLight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,644Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 16

Summary: After Tobia Budge attacked Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham gets a phone call, his friend, John Stiliski, is dead, and his son, Stiles Stilinski, is in a coma. Will goes to Beacon Hills to Stiles. Emerging from a three-week coma, Stiles was told that his father, John Stilinski, had died in the accident that led to his coma, and that he had to find himself back in 2013. But that wasn't his most significant issue. No, it was the fact that in this reality, Will Graham was his biological father. Someone Stiles, only known as a TV show character!
